Name: Form
Desc: Form is a simple library for creating forms and windows in the browser. It provides a set of methods for creating form elements, windows, and other UI components.
LongDesc: The Form plugin provides a unified API for creating, styling, and managing form components and modal windows in the browser. It includes a set of methods for generating form elements, handling events, and managing UI state, and serves as the foundation for all Form.* components.
